data.name: Daring Academy: Chapter 1 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the world of Daring Academy!



After high school, the player moves into a new apartment in the city of Olis with their best friend Amelia Sweet to attend college at Sacred Heart Academy. Meet Lily Cortez, Rose Wheatley, Elizabeth Robinson and Clementine Neonica, create trust, relationships, explore the deepest parts of Olis, collect clues and tons more in this semester filled with craziness.

This demo includes the entirety of Chapter 1. Any bugs and issues regarding this chapter will be fixed in the full game. Please visit the Itch.io page to continue to play Chapter 2 and beyond.

Featuring:

  • Customizable name, nickname, gender and pronouns.
  • Profanity option.
  • A brand new world to discover!
  • 2 songs written by characters in the game.
  • Multiple different endings.

Meet the crew:


Amelia Sweet
A young 18-year-old girl and the main character's best friend. Amelia Sweet tries to stay by their side to help with any issues or pain they may have, and 10 years later, their friendship is still as strong as ever. Amelia is often shown as a sweet and caring person, but is often reserved as she doesn't wanna show her emotions to other people. She often spends her time alone, and doesn't really talks to other people other than just her best friend.

Lily Cortez
She might have issues that she doesn't want to reveal to anyone, Lily Cortez, a 17-year-old girl, has been raised to be a sweet girl. Even though she is often shown as a shy person, she keeps her emotions to herself and often spends her time alone, dealing with her weaknesses due to her mother's death.

Rose Wheatley
When at home, Rose Wheatley always thinks to have a nice and safe environment with Iris Wheatley and her parents. A Portal 2 lover to the core. While Rose is generally an outgoing and active person, she usually spends most of her time with her best friend, Lily Cortez, to overcome Lily's depression due to her mother's death.

Elizabeth Robinson
While she is a fan of Porter Robinson, Elizabeth Robinson, an 18-year-old girl, is often told she is an angel, she's usually sweet, caring and passionate about others but if she's in a debate, she will push it beyond her limits, trying every inch to win it.

Clementine Neonica
VANISHMENT THIS WORLD! If you feel weird about her behavior, it's common with Clementine Neonica, an 18-year-old girl. She is a chūnibyō, constantly living out her fantasies and exhibiting strange behaviors as a result. She's very open about them, and she claims that she has "Fast Movement" and "Hard Light Construct", and a crystal which "traps light in order to use her powers at night". Though she does her best to commit to her fantasies, she can break character, such as when she feels embarrassed or flustered.


This game covers sensitive topics which some players may find upsetting. Please see in-game for more details.

data.short_description: You move to a new futuristic college in Olis with your best friend, Amelia Sweet, and meet others. Create trust, relationships, explore the deepest parts of Olis, etc. Will you grow close or drift further apart? Welcome to the crazy world of Daring Academy: Chapter 1 Demo!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
